footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Baizhu | Update Date: 05/04/2023 | Editor: tAlpha#9191

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Jadefall's Splendor__
His best in slot option. However he cant utilize well the DMG% buff in its passive, his personal damage is negligable

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Prototype Amber__
Best 4 star option as an only HP% 4* catalyst. And its also craftable
__Favonius Codex__
Provides ER% with team wide energy generation, but it requires a decent amount of Crit Rate

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> HP%, Energy Recharge%|<goblet> HP%|<circlet> Healing Bonus, HP%

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** __Elemental Burst:__ Holistic Revivification
**2)** __Elemental Skill:__ Universal Diagnosis
**3)** __Normal Attack:__ The Classics of Acupuncture

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
- If you already have a character that has Deepwood Memories in your team or if you are playing an Aggravate team than there is no need to go for it on Baizhu.

- Can run Crit Rate circlet to proc fav passive

- If you are not playing him as a Driver, leveling up normal attacks can be skipped.
